EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Paul_Roundtable_Singapore_Q215.Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Executive Roundtable with Pivotal CEO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Thank you for registering for the upcoming Executive Roundtable with Pivotal CEO <http://connect.pivotal.io/executive-roundtable-singapore.html>. Please find the event details below.
Date: June 3, 2015
Address: db Bistro Moderne <http://www.dbbistro.com/singapore/> 2 Bayfront Avenue The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands Singapore 018972
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:info@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
